SEARCH
Package ca.concordia.soen6441.project.map

Class ValidateMapImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.map.ValidateMapImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidateMap
public class ValidateMapImpl extends Object implements ValidateMap
Implementation of the ValidateMap interface. Provides methods to check the validity of the map, ensuring that all countries are connected and properly assigned to continents.

  • Method Details

    • isMapValid

      public boolean isMapValid()
      Validates the map by checking if the graph of countries is connected and if each country belongs to a valid continent.
      Specified by:
      isMapValid in interface ValidateMap
      Returns:
      true if the map is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateNeighborExistence

      private boolean validateNeighborExistence()
      Validate that every neighbor in a country's neighbor list exists in d_Countries.
      Returns:
      true if every neighbor in a country's neighbor list exists in d_Countries, otherwise false

    • validateBidirectionalNeighbors

      private boolean validateBidirectionalNeighbors()
      Validate that neighbor relationships are bidirectional.
      Returns:
      true if every neighbor relationships are bidirectional, otherwise false.

    • isGraphConnected

      private boolean isGraphConnected()
      Helper method to check if the graph of countries is connected
      Returns:
      true if all countries are connected, false otherwise.

    • exploreCountries

      private void exploreCountries(String p_countryID, Set<String> p_visited)
      DFS (depth first search) to explore all connected countries
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The starting country ID for traversal.
      p_visited - A set of visited country IDs to track traversal.

    • validateContinents

      private boolean validateContinents()
      Helper method to validate continent-country relationship
      Returns:
      true if every country is attached to a continent, otherwise false

    • isCountryBelongsToOnlyOneContinent

      private boolean isCountryBelongsToOnlyOneContinent()
      Checks whether each country belongs to only one continent.
      Returns:
      true if each country belongs to exactly one continent, false otherwise.
